thread.title: JATA Tourism Expo Japan cuts ribbon this morning
thread.title_full: JATA Tourism Expo Japan cuts ribbon this morning

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: JATA Tourism Expo Japan cuts ribbon this morning
text:
JATA Tourism Expo Japan cuts ribbon this morning   
Sep 25, 2015   
Tokyo Big Sight Exhibition Center is the venue for JATA Tourism Expo in Japan. 
Representatives of the tourism industry in Japan and abroad, as well as tourism ministers from various countries, attended the Opening Ceremony for JATA Tourism Expo Japan this morning. 
Leaders of the Japanese Tourism Industry and Government are thinking big. They want JATA Tourism Expo the prime event in the world for this global industry. 
Paskal Lamy, chair of the UNWTO World Committee on Tourism Ethics presented his keynote speech on Tourism and Culture followed by a panel discussion. eTN Publisher Juergen T Steinmetz meeting at the Seychelles Stand at JATA Tourism Expo Japan 
In the meantime exhibitors from around the world were showing their tourism product, while Japan is out in full force to make inbound tourism to the country as important as outbound. 
eTN Publisher Juergen T. Steinmetz is attending the event.
